diff_act: 1.Update requests from the GUI for status updates within 2 seconds, excluding device and network response times.
2.Refresh the facility map on the screen every 2 seconds, configurable via the database.
3.Adjust the refresh rate of the facility map via the database.
4.Deliver RLCS notifications irrespective of the operator's login status.

regen.absent_element: ability to adjust the refresh rate of the facility map via the database
regen.new_specification: The system shall allow adjustment of the facility map refresh rate through configurations in the database.

regen.absent_element: adjustability of facility map refresh rate via the database
regen.new_specification: The system shall allow configuration of the facility map refresh rate via the database.

regen.absent_element: configurability of facility map refresh rate via the database
regen.new_specification: The system shall allow configuration of the facility map refresh rate via the database.

label: Refreshrate of the facility map can be configurable within the database to more than 2 seconds by the user.
absence: action of modifying refresh rate within the database
